greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = gcd(sum of all prime factors of n, n).
comment: a(n) = n iff n is prime. - _Robert Israel_, Mar 29 2015
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: PrimeFactors[n_Integer] := Flatten[ Table[ # [[1]], {1}] & /@ FactorInteger[n]]; f[n_] := GCD[Plus @@ PrimeFactors[n], n]; Table[ f[n], {n, 93}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 04 2004 *)
results.author: _Labos Elemer_, Oct 28 2004
